text:
hi, 
I am facing this below issue in JSF 2.0 + Spring + Hibernate + Apache Tomcat 7.x environment. can you anybody help me to fix it.

text:
java.lang.NullPointerException at com.sun.faces.context.flash.ELFlash.loggingGetPhaseMapForWriting


it is not allowing me to see the index page. all the code is based on JSF and Spring. as of i know tomcat 7.0.10 is supporting JSF and Spring integration. when i added some navigation rules in the faces-config.xml and some jsp changes in the index.jsp. i was stuck up with the above specified exception and it is continues 2 mins as long as i hit the URL in the browser. finally i result with the above exception.


please help me to fix it. thanks in advance for any kind of help.

regards,
kalyan
